trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for the Data Encryption Standard (DES) algorithm from which all DES implementations must derive.
trans-unit.target: Representerer basisklasse for algoritmen Data Encryption Standard (DES) som alle DES implementeringer må være utledet.

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports a key length of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter en nøkkellengde på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A newer asymmetric encryption algorithm, Advanced Encryption Standard (AES), is available.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > En nyere, asymmetriske krypteringsalgoritme, Avansert Encryption AES (Standard), er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Consider using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes> class instead of the DES class.
trans-unit.target: Vurder å bruke <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>klassen i stedet for DES klasse.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Aes>

trans-unit.source: Use DES only for compatibility with legacy applications and data.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DES bare for kompatibilitet med eldre programmer og data.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette en forekomst av en abstrakt klasse.

trans-unit.source: Application code will create a new instance of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Programmet koden vil opprette en ny forekomst av en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the protected fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm> class to the default values shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden initialiserer beskyttede feltene for den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>klassen til standardverdiene vises i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm>

trans-unit.source: |Field|Default Value| |-----------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|64| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|64| |<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|
trans-unit.target: | Feltet | Standardverdien | |-----------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>|&64; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>|&64; | | <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue>|64|</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.FeedbackSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySizeValue>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en kryptografisk objektet til å utføre Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES> object that can be used for encrypting and decrypting data.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>objekter som kan brukes til å kryptere og dekryptere data.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk objekt.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a cryptographic object to perform the specified implementation of the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av en kryptografisk objektet til å utføre den angitte implementeringen av Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: The name of the specific implementation of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på bestemte implementeringen av <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"> </xref> skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: A cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: En kryptografisk objekt.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is semi-weak.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er bare svake.

trans-unit.source: Semi-weak keys are pairs of keys that result in ciphers that are easy to break.
trans-unit.target: Bare svake nøkler er par med nøkler som forårsaker chiffreringer som er lett å bryte.

trans-unit.source: If text is encrypted with a semi-weak key, encrypting the resulting cipher with the partner of that semi-weak key returns the original text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis teksten er kryptert med en delvis svake nøkkel, returnerer kryptering resulterende cipher med partner bare svake nøkkelen den opprinnelige teksten.

trans-unit.source: There are six known semi-weak key pairs for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algorithm; this method checks for those semi-weak keys.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes seks kjente, bare svake nøkkelpar for Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algoritmen; denne metoden søker etter de bare svake nøklene.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set a semi-weak key results in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en delvis svake key resulterer i en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a random key, a semi-weak key will never be returned.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>kalles for å opprette en tilfeldig nøkkel, en delvis svak nøkkel aldri returneres.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to test for semi-weakness.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel for testing delvis svakhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is semi-weak; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen er bare svake; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the rgbKey parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på den rgbKey parameteren er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is weak.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er svake.

trans-unit.source: Weak keys are keys that result in ciphers that are easy to break.
trans-unit.target: Svake nøkler er nøkler som forårsaker chiffreringer som er lett å bryte.

trans-unit.source: If text is encrypted with a weak key, encrypting the resulting cipher again with the same weak key returns the original text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis teksten er kryptert med en svake nøkkel, returnerer kryptering resulterende cipher på nytt med samme svake nøkkel den opprinnelige teksten.

trans-unit.source: There are four known weak keys for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algorithm; this method checks for those weak keys.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes fire kjente svake nøkler for Data Encryption Standard (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>) algoritmen; denne metoden søker etter de svake nøklene.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to set a weak key results in a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en svake key resulterer i en <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptographicException>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a random key, a weak key will never be returned.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>kalles for å opprette en tilfeldig nøkkel, en svake nøkkel aldri returneres.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The secret key to test for weakness.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel for testing svakhet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key is weak; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen er svake; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The size of the rgbKey parameter is not valid.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på den rgbKey parameteren er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the secret key for the Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hemmelig nøkkel for Data Encryption Standard (<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref>) algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `null` when it is used, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A> is called to create a new random value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `null` når det brukes, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A>kalles for å opprette en ny, tilfeldig verdi.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.GenerateKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The length of the key must be equal to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>.
trans-unit.target: Lengden på nøkkelen må være lik <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue>

trans-unit.source: This algorithm supports a key length of 64 bits.
trans-unit.target: Denne algoritmen støtter en nøkkellengde på 64-biters.

trans-unit.source: The secret key for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"></xref> algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hemmelig nøkkel for den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.DES"> </xref> algoritmen.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the key to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å sette nøkkelen til <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a key whose length is not equal to <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en nøkkel lengden ikke er lik <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm.BlockSizeValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set a weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES.IsWeakKey*>) or a semi-weak key (see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DES.IsSemiWeakKey*>).
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en svake nøkkel (se <> </> *>) eller en delvis svake nøkkel (se <> </> *>).
